title: Provides that state emergency management office vehicles be included in the definition of authorized emergency vehicle
summary: Provides that state emergency management office vehicles be included in the definition of authorized emergency vehicle.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         2745

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                   January 20, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by  M.  of  A. PERRY -- Multi-Sponsored by -- M. of A. MENG,
         PHEFFER, TOWNS -- read once and referred to the Committee on Transpor-
         tation

       AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to the list  of
         authorized emergency vehicles

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. Section 101 of the vehicle and traffic law, as  amended  by
    2  chapter 446 of the laws of 2003, is amended to read as follows:
    3    S  101.  Authorized emergency vehicle. Every ambulance, police vehicle
    4  or bicycle, correction vehicle, fire vehicle,  civil  defense  emergency
    5  vehicle,  STATE EMERGENCY MANAGEMENT OFFICE VEHICLE, emergency ambulance
    6  service  vehicle,  blood  delivery  vehicle,  county  emergency  medical
    7  services  vehicle,  environmental emergency response vehicle, sanitation
    8  patrol vehicle,  hazardous  materials  emergency  vehicle  and  ordnance
    9  disposal vehicle of the armed forces of the United States.
   10    S 2. This act shall take effect immediately.





        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD02640-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to the list of authorized emergency vehicles
